title: Adventure And RPG Audio Pack
description: 20 Songs for your game and 16 Fanfares, more than an hour of music!
longDescription:
Hello Dev!


This music pack for adventure and RPG games was based on famous old-school games, in it you will find songs for moments of peace and tranquility, some of uncertainty, others of battle, and several other scenarios.


It was made thinking about making the player completely immersed in the game experience, always passing some kind of emotion according to the music.


Of course, I made the package thinking about adventure and RPG games, but suddenly if you're making a game of some other style where the music fits, you can definitely invest that will work too!


It also comes with 16 fanfares for when something good or bad happens to your player, examples: Win a battle, level up, defeat a monster, lose a battle, lose a fight, break equipment. Among others!


LISTEN HERE (Soundtrack)

CHECK THE DOCUMENTATION


  1. Adventure Time! (03:12)
  2. Born in a Temple (03:00)
  3. Call For a Memorie (03:10)
  4. Distant Peace (03:00)
  5. Enthusiastic Hunting (03:04)
  6. Flying on a Dream (03:00)
  7. Get your sword (03:01)
  8. Her Melancolic End (03:00)
  9. In To The Void (03:01)
  10. Jump in to Battle (03:00)
  11. Karate Robot (03:00)
  12. Lair's and The Dragons Fire (03:05)
  13. My Sad Ending (03:12)
  14. Not So Far (03:00)
  15. Our Village (03:04)
  16. Punch of the titan (03:19)
  17. Quite peacefull (03:00)
  18. Rocket Quest (03:00)
  19. See a Weird Dance (03:05)
  20. The last (03:05)


and more 16 Fanfares!


It'll fit several diferent parts of a game, it has music for adventure, battle, sad, electronic, melancolic, and others :)

Feel free to ask me any question!
